text: The 2023–24 Sheffield Shield season is the 122nd season of the Sheffield Shield, the domestic first-class cricket competition being played in Australia. The tournament started in October 2023. Western Australia are the defending champions. In June 2023, Cricket Australia revealed the fixtures of the tournament. ==Points table== Team 1 6 3 1 2 0 9.77 0 29.77 2 6 3 1 2 0 8.22 0 28.22 3 6 3 2 1 0 7.12 0 26.12 4 6 2 3 1 0 8.59 0 21.59 5 6 2 4 0 0 9.41 0 21.41 6 6 1 3 2 0 7.12 0 15.12 ==Round-Robin stage== ===Round 1=== \---- \---- ===Round 2=== \---- \---- ===Round 3=== \---- \---- ===Round 4=== \---- \---- ===Round 5=== ===Round 6=== ===Round 7=== ===Round 8=== ===Round 9=== ===Round 10=== ==Final== ==References== Category:Sheffield Shield
